*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Samuel M. Williams, Brazoria, July 22, 1832, Instructing him to provide transportation and supplies for Mexican troops.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[From Williams Papers, Rosenberg Library, Galveston, Tex.]*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr Samuel M. Williams*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Furnish the *person_mentioned*troops */person_mentioned*of *person_mentioned*Lieut. Col. Ugartechea*/person_mentioned* two wagons and provisions to last to*location_mentioned* La Bahia*/location_mentioned* and two hundred dollars in cash. I have recd, here two hundred dollars [more?] and will take them up with me—make contracts for the waggons etc so as to get the proper vouchers. The provisions can be got in part on the road, some on *location_mentioned*Colorado */location_mentioned*and some on *location_mentioned*Navidad*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="07-22-1832">July 22 1832*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*The waggons are needed to *location_mentioned*La Bahia*/location_mentioned*—it probably will be the better plan to get them as far as *location_mentioned*Guadalupe*/location_mentioned*, and have them re- placed there by others for*location_mentioned* La Bahia*/location_mentioned*—or perhaps some may [be] had on *location_mentioned*Navidad */location_mentioned*or *location_mentioned*La Bahia*/location_mentioned*, All this can be done by writing to *person_mentioned*James Kerr, */person_mentioned*or some others.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*Also furnish a horse for *person_mentioned*Lieut. Manuel Pintado*/person_mentioned* to [co]me to this place—and Bagages for the *person_mentioned*officers */person_mentioned*to go to *person_mentioned*La Bahia*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Amigo *person_mentioned*D. Samuel*/person_mentioned*: No tengo lugar escribirle solo le digo qe *person_mentioned*Duclor */person_mentioned*queda con su destino, y yo marcho a *location_mentioned*Matamoros */location_mentioned*exp. a la Señorita, y le encargo a V. qe me abilite a mi *person_mentioned*tropa */person_mentioned*lo mas pronto hta *location_mentioned*la Bahia*/location_mentioned* pa. qe no tengan dificultades.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*D. Ugartechea */person_mentioned*[Rubric]*/p*
*p*(Indorsed):*person_mentioned* S. F. Austin */person_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="07-xx-1832">July 1832*/date_mentioned* Order in favor of *person_mentioned*Ugartechea */person_mentioned*for money.*/p*
*/div1*
